And and that's why I think that the targeting the downstream activity of bacteria is something that is that um holds maybe more potential compared to to try and and target specific species or colonize with specific bacteria and then you bypass any issues of colonization and and complexity of the microbiome and and effect on the community and and so on. So it's not like a huge kind of uh drug screen that you can do, but you can do some screening in in in tissue culture or in organoids model or in um cultured neurons.
